verse.line: Be- hold how good a thing it is,
And how be- com- ing well,
When those that breth- ren are de- light
In u- ni- ty to dwell.
For it is like the pre- cious oil
Poured out on Aar- on's head,
That, go- ing down up- on his beard,
Up- on his gar- ments spead.
Like Her- mon's dew up- on the hills
Of Zi- on that de- scends,
The LORD com- mands His bless- ing there,
Ev'n life that nev- er ends.
